participant_1.background:

i love watching funny movies.
my two dogs are the best friends a girl could have.
I'm grateful for my health and the ability to work on my farm.
I filmed a documentary about a group of people who were following their dreams and it was an amazing experience.

i hope to save enough money for it.

I am sometimes unable to control my anger and end up saying hurtful things.

content.text: I filmed a documentary about a group of people who were following their dreams and it was an amazing experience.
Oh wow. What inspired you to do that?
I've always been passionate about film making and I think it's important to highlight the stories of people who are working hard to achieve their goals.
That's awesome. I'm sure it was a great experience.
It was! I'm really proud of the work I did and I can't wait to share it with the world.
I'm sure you'll do great. I know I'm excited to see it!
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my family, especially taking my son to the zoo to see koalas. I also love watching funny movies and cooking.
Oh that sounds like a lot of fun. I love cooking too! What are some of your favorite dishes to make?
I love making pasta dishes, especially lasagna. I also love making soups and stews.
Those sound delicious! I'm not really a good cook, but I'm always trying to learn new recipes.
It's definitely a fun hobby to have. I'm always happy to share my recipes if you're ever interested.
Thanks! I'll keep that in mind.
